verses.verse: And <WG2532> the <WG3588> fifth <WG3991> angel <WG32> sounded, <WG4537> and <WG2532> I saw <WG1492> a star <WG792> fall <WG4098> from <WG1537> heaven <WG3772> unto <WG1519> the <WG3588> earth: <WG1093> and <WG2532> to him <WG846> was given <WG1325> the <WG3588> key <WG2807> of the <WG3588> bottomless <WG12> pit. <WG5421>

And <WG2532> he opened <WG455> the <WG3588> bottomless <WG12> pit; <WG5421> and <WG2532> there arose <WG305> a smoke <WG2586> out of <WG1537> the <WG3588> pit, <WG5421> as <WG5613> the smoke <WG2586> of a great <WG3173> furnace; <WG2575> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> sun <WG2246> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> air <WG109> were darkened <WG4654> by reason of <WG1537> the <WG3588> smoke <WG2586> of the <WG3588> pit. <WG5421>

And <WG2532> there came <WG1831> out of <WG1537> the <WG3588> smoke <WG2586> locusts <WG200> upon <WG1519> the <WG3588> earth: <WG1093> and <WG2532> unto them <WG846> was given <WG1325> power, <WG1849> as <WG5613> the <WG3588> scorpions <WG4651> of the <WG3588> earth <WG1093> have <WG2192> power. <WG1849>

And <WG2532> it was commanded <WG4483> them <WG846> that <WG2443> they should not <WG3361> hurt <WG91> the <WG3588> grass <WG5528> of the <WG3588> earth, <WG1093> neither <WG3761> any <WG3956> green thing, <WG5515> neither <WG3761> any <WG3956> tree; <WG1186> but <WG1508> only <WG3441> those men <WG444> which <WG3748> have <WG2192> not <WG3756> the <WG3588> seal <WG4973> of God <WG2316> in <WG1909> their <WG848> foreheads. <WG3359>

And <WG2532> to them <WG846> it was given <WG1325> that <WG2443> they should not <WG3361> kill <WG615> them, <WG846> but <WG235> that <WG2443> they should be tormented <WG928> five <WG4002> months: <WG3376> and <WG2532> their <WG848> torment <WG929> was the torment <WG929> of a scorpion, <WG4651> when <WG3752> he striketh <WG3817> a man. <WG444>

And <WG2532> in <WG1722> those <WG1565> days <WG2250> shall men <WG444> seek <WG2212> death, <WG2288> and <WG2532> shall not <WG3756> find <WG2147> it; <WG846> and <WG2532> shall desire <WG1937> to die, <WG599> and <WG2532> death <WG2288> shall flee <WG5343> from <WG575> them. <WG846>

And <WG2532> the <WG3588> shapes <WG3667> of the <WG3588> locusts <WG200> were like unto <WG3664> horses <WG2462> prepared <WG2090> unto <WG1519> battle; <WG4171> and <WG2532> on <WG1909> their <WG848> heads <WG2776> were as it were <WG5613> crowns <WG4735> like <WG3664> gold, <WG5557> and <WG2532> their <WG848> faces <WG4383> were as <WG5613> the faces <WG4383> of men. <WG444>
And <WG2532> they had <WG2192> hair <WG2359> as <WG5613> the hair <WG2359> of women, <WG1135> and <WG2532> their <WG848> teeth <WG3599> were <WG2258> as <WG5613> the teeth of lions. <WG3023>

And <WG2532> they had <WG2192> breastplates, <WG2382> as it were <WG5613> breastplates <WG2382> of iron; <WG4603> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> sound <WG5456> of their <WG848> wings <WG4420> was as <WG5613> the sound <WG5456> of chariots <WG716> of many <WG4183> horses <WG2462> running <WG5143> to <WG1519> battle. <WG4171>

And <WG2532> they had <WG2192> tails <WG3769> like unto <WG3664> scorpions, <WG4651> and <WG2532> there were <WG2258> stings <WG2759> in <WG1722> their <WG848> tails: <WG3769> and <WG2532> their <WG848> power <WG1849> was to hurt <WG91> men <WG444> five <WG4002> months. <WG3376>

And <WG2532> they had <WG2192> a king <WG935> over <WG1909> them, <WG846> which is the <WG3588> angel <WG32> of the <WG3588> bottomless pit, <WG12> whose <WG846> name <WG3686> in the Hebrew tongue <WG1447> is Abaddon, <WG3> but <WG2532> in <WG1722> the <WG3588> Greek tongue <WG1673> hath <WG2192> his name <WG3686> Apollyon. <WG623>
One <WG3391> woe <WG3759> is past; <WG565> and, behold, <WG2400> there come <WG2064> two <WG1417> woes <WG3759> more <WG2089> hereafter. <WG3326> <WG5023>

And <WG2532> the <WG3588> sixth <WG1623> angel <WG32> sounded, <WG4537> and <WG2532> I heard <WG191> a <WG3391> voice <WG5456> from <WG1537> the <WG3588> four <WG5064> horns <WG2768> of the <WG3588> golden <WG5552> altar <WG2379> which <WG3588> is before <WG1799> God, <WG2316>

Saying <WG3004> to the <WG3588> sixth <WG1623> angel <WG32> which <WG3739> had <WG2192> the <WG3588> trumpet, <WG4536> Loose <WG3089> the <WG3588> four <WG5064> angels <WG32> which are bound <WG1210> in <WG1909> the <WG3588> great <WG3173> river <WG4215> Euphrates. <WG2166>

And <WG2532> the <WG3588> four <WG5064> angels <WG32> were loosed, <WG3089> which were prepared <WG2090> for <WG1519> an hour, <WG5610> and <WG2532> a day, <WG2250> and <WG2532> a month, <WG3376> and <WG2532> a year, <WG1763> for to <WG2443> slay <WG615> the <WG3588> third part <WG5154> of men. <WG444>

And <WG2532> the <WG3588> number <WG706> of the army <WG4753> of the <WG3588> horsemen <WG2461> were two hundred thousand thousand: <WG1417> <WG3461> <WG3461> and <WG2532> I heard <WG191> the <WG3588> number <WG706> of them. <WG846>

And <WG2532> thus <WG3779> I saw <WG1492> the <WG3588> horses <WG2462> in <WG1722> the <WG3588> vision, <WG3706> and <WG2532> them that sat <WG2521> on <WG1909> them, <WG846> having <WG2192> breastplates <WG2382> of fire, <WG4447> and <WG2532> of jacinth, <WG5191> and <WG2532> brimstone: <WG2306> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> heads <WG2776> of the <WG3588> horses <WG2462> were as <WG5613> the heads <WG2776> of lions; <WG3023> and <WG2532> out of <WG1537> their <WG848> mouths <WG4750> issued <WG1607> fire <WG4442> and <WG2532> smoke <WG2586> and <WG2532> brimstone. <WG2303>

By <WG5259> these <WG5130> three <WG5140> was the <WG3588> third part <WG5154> of men <WG444> killed, <WG615> by <WG1537> the <WG3588> fire, <WG4442> and <WG2532> by <WG1537> the <WG3588> smoke, <WG2586> and <WG2532> by <WG1537> the <WG3588> brimstone, <WG2303> which issued <WG1607> out of <WG1537> their <WG848> mouths. <WG4750>

For <WG1063> their <WG848> power <WG1849> is <WG1526> in <WG1722> their <WG848> mouth, <WG4750> and <WG2532> in <WG1722> their <WG848> tails: <WG3769> for <WG1063> their <WG848> tails <WG3769> were like unto <WG3664> serpents, <WG3789> and had <WG2192> heads, <WG2776> and <WG2532> with <WG1722> them <WG846> they do hurt. <WG91>

And <WG2532> the <WG3588> rest <WG3062> of the <WG3588> men <WG444> which <WG3739> were not <WG3756> killed <WG615> by <WG1722> these <WG5025> plagues <WG4127> yet repented not <WG3777> <WG3340> of <WG1537> the <WG3588> works <WG2041> of their <WG848> hands, <WG5495> that <WG2443> they should not <WG3361> worship <WG4352> devils, <WG1140> and <WG2532> idols <WG1497> of gold, <WG5552> and <WG2532> silver, <WG693> and <WG2532> brass, <WG5470> and <WG2532> stone, <WG3035> and <WG2532> of wood: <WG3585> which <WG3739> neither <WG3777> can <WG1410> see, <WG991> nor <WG3777> hear, <WG191> nor <WG3777> walk: <WG4043>

Neither <WG2532> <WG3756> repented <WG3340> they of <WG1537> their <WG848> murders, <WG5408> nor <WG3777> of <WG1537> their <WG848> sorceries, <WG5331> nor <WG3777> of <WG1537> their <WG848> fornication, <WG4202> nor <WG3777> of <WG1537> their <WG848> thefts. <WG2809>
